test_output_summary: All 13 tests in test_graphiti_capture.py passed successfully. Tests cover command registration, interactive flag requirement, focus options, max-questions limit, all 9 focus areas, error handling, and full workflow integration.
implementation_notes: Updated documentation for FEAT-GR-004 Interactive Knowledge Capture. Added comprehensive Graphiti Knowledge Capture section to CLAUDE.md with CLI usage, all focus categories, session flow diagram, and AutoBuild customization examples. Marked FEAT-GR-004 as implemented with implementation notes including key decisions, testing coverage, and integration points.
requirements_addressed: Add CLI usage to CLAUDE.md - Added comprehensive section with guardkit graphiti capture examples
Document all focus categories - Documented all 9 categories including 3 AutoBuild-specific ones
Add AutoBuild customization examples - Added examples for role-customization, quality-gates, and workflow-preferences
Include session flow diagrams - Added ASCII art diagram showing 6-step capture flow
Mark FEAT-GR-004 as implemented - Updated status, added implementation notes and final integration points
